text: The South Lafourche Bridge crosses Bayou Lafourche at Louisiana Highway 3162 and East 90th Street in the town of Galliano, Louisiana. Built in 1972, this vertical-lift bridge has a total length of 253.8 feet with its largest span at 104 feet. The bridge deck is 27.8 feet wide, and there is a vertical clearance above the deck of 17.4 feet. ==References== Category:Road bridges in Louisiana Category:Vertical lift bridges in Louisiana Category:Buildings and structures in Lafourche Parish, Louisiana
title: South Lafourche Bridge
